sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Create a vCore Database in Microsoft Azure.

Inputs:

  • Subscription Id - Subscription ID that identifies an Azure Subscription.
  • Resource GroupName - Name of the Resource Group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
  • Server Name - Name of the Server.
  • Database Name - Name of the Database to be created.
  • Location - Name of Database Location.
  • SKU - SKU Properties to create Database.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Either Subscription ID or Resource Group or Server or Database or API Version entered is invalid or not found.
  • Either mismatch between properties or property values entered are invalid.
